        Retrieve the list of constraints associated with this definition.

      • getDescription

        MarkupLine getDescription()
        Get the text that describes the basic use of the definition.
        Returns:
        a line of markup text

      • getModuleScope

        @NotNull
@NotNull ModuleScopeEnum getModuleScope()
        Retrieve the definition's scope within the context of its defining module.
        Returns:
        the module scope

      • isGlobal

        boolean isGlobal()
        A definition can be locally defined (inline with instances) or globally defined. In the former case isGlobal() will be false, and in the latter case isGlobal() will be true.
        Returns:
        true if the definition is globally defined, or false otherwise

      • toCoordinates

        default String toCoordinates()
        Generates a coordinate string for the provided information element definition. A coordinate consists of the element's:
        • containing Metaschema's short name
        • model type
        • name
        • hash code
        Specified by:
        toCoordinates in interface IModelElement
        Returns:
        the coordinate
